casebody.data:
CITY OF ATLANTIC CITY, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. NEW JERSEY ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Submitted February 22, 1984 Decided February 29, 1984.

Before Judges BOTTER, PRESSLER and O’BRIEN.

*345Matthew H. Powals, City Solicitor, attorney for appellant. No brief was filed by respondent. PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed substantially for the reasons stated by Judge Rimm in his opinion reported at 5 N.J.Tax 137 (Tax Ct.1983).
